text: Zepp or Zepps is the surname of: * Bill Zepp (born 1946), American retired Major League Baseball pitcher * Rob Zepp (born 1981), Canadian ice hockey goaltender * Josh Zepps (formerly Josh Szeps), Australian media personality, political satirist and TV show host * Katrina Zepps (1918–1980), Australian nurse and educator born in the Russian Empire
title: Zepp (surname)
